name: Come, Oddity
description:
This is a short adventure game about the effects of The System on an empathetic and imaginative mind. Collect resources, do favors for your neighbors in a cute, bouncy cartoon world!

Controls: 

Arrow Keys to move

Space Bar to Interact

Mouse can also be used to move and interact

Music by Ravancloak! 

Find her sweet tunes here:

https://ravancloak.neocities.org/
